idea: With ever-increasing demand for first- and last-mile delivery segments, there is an increasing need for cargo logistic vehicles. The current conventional fuelled vehicle emits about 3.7 ton of carbon and 20kg NOx per year. These vehicles have high running costs due to the increasing conventional fuel prices every day. There are few companies addressing these issues by building battery-tech solutions for this, the customers usually are unattracted due to high upfront costs and lack of innovation. With efficient and effective supply chain management, we can offer these electric vehicles at a competitive price as compared to our competitors. We have a strong network of vendors that are determined to meet our demands. We along with our vendors are creating innovative solutions like Fast-Charging for low downtime and Battery Cooling System that can handle the tropical heat in India. We also work closely with our customers to provide them customized IOT-based solutions for their needs.
name: KHANIYA MOBILITY PRIVATE LIMITED
